front.title: A YANG Module for Network Address Translation (NAT) and Network Prefix Translation (NPT)

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG module for the Network Address Translation (NAT) function. Network Address Translation from IPv4 to IPv4 (NAT44), Network Address and Protocol Translation from IPv6 Clients to IPv4 Servers (NAT64), customer-side translator (CLAT), Stateless IP/ICMP Translation (SIIT), Explicit Address Mappings (EAM) for SIIT, IPv6-to-IPv6 Network Prefix Translation (NPTv6), and Destination NAT are covered in this document.
